comments.body:
You're going to need a `build` section that includes the C compiler like in:

https://github.com/conda-forge/staged-recipes/blob/master/recipes/example/meta.yaml#L38-L41

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +15,19 @@  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ compiler('c') }}
